dict.string:
Please note that personal information /will/ be sent through the server URL above. This may include your location, emails, contacts, messages, calendar, reminders, and speech recordings.
Please be sure you understand this before entering a proxy URL above.

SiriSwitch was hacked together by XtremD to serve as a proxy switch for the iPhone4S from some of the Sirihooking portions of Spire. Many thanks to Grant Paul (chpwn), Ryan Petrich, planetbeing and mvit for releasing Spire, an awesome Siri installation tool for old iPhones and for releasing their code under an open source license.
Current SiriSwitch source code can be found here: --------
Have fun hacking Siri! -XtremD
